definition: wordless and uncommunicative (idiom); without speaking/taciturn/not providing any news
lit. crow and peacock make no sound/absolute silence (idiom); not a single voice can be heard/absolute silence
not a sound to be heard (idiom)/dead silent

sentences.english: Nothing was heard in the room but the hurrying pen of the stripling.
sentences.chinese: 屋子里悄然无声，只有年轻人的笔匆忙划过纸页。

sentences.english: The most effective air—ion producer is worked by statistic effluvium.
sentences.chinese: 最有效的离子发生器是无声放电式的。

sentences.english: Back on Earth, in a wordless montage, Batman goes to see Vixen.
sentences.chinese: 无声的蒙太奇镜头闪回了地球，蝙蝠侠去看维克森。

sentences.english: It is possible for kiai to be completely without sound.
sentences.chinese: 完全无声的气合也是有的。

sentences.english: Zhang Jingjing has been the face of silent tears fall quietly.
sentences.chinese: 张晶晶脸上无声的泪水已悄然滑落。

sentences.english: How can she disappear without any message?
sentences.chinese: 她怎么可以无声无息的，就在这个城市消失？

sentences.english: Riches, the dumb god, that givest all men tongues.
sentences.chinese: 无声的上帝，赋予所有人以语言。

sentences.english: On it came-on, silently and stealthily, to the bed's head.
sentences.chinese: 它走上前来，无声无息偷偷摸摸地摸到了床头。
监视哨只是些无声的人影罢了。

sentences.english: He in whose chant all your singing is but a soundless throbbing.
sentences.chinese: 在他的咏唱里，你的歌声只是无声的颤动。

sentences.english: The spring of the silent night, thin cool, long thin flow cup text.
sentences.chinese: 春寂无声，暗夜薄凉，文字的杯盏细水流长。

sentences.english: As more time passes real world problems begin to surface.
sentences.chinese: 时间继续无声无息得流过，现实问题开始崭露头角。

sentences.english: In the fourth year of our word-driven, wordless contact, a note arrived.
sentences.chinese: 经过四年的文字和无声的联系，我收到了一张便条。

sentences.english: Such lost worlds are vanishingly rare.
sentences.chinese: 这样消逝的世界正在悄无声息地变得稀有起来。

sentences.english: Yet he will die unsought, unknown.
sentences.chinese: 然而他将默默无声地死去。

sentences.english: A silent killer lurks beneath the surface of this West African lake.
sentences.chinese: 在这个西非洲湖泊的表面下潜藏着一个无声的杀手。

definition: to remain silent/to have nothing to say
wordless and uncommunicative (idiom); without speaking/taciturn/not providing any news
